title.zh: 南昌：携带者检测费用援助项目线上宣讲
title.en: Nanchang: Online Lecture on Carrier Testing Cost Assistance Project

subtitle.zh: 专家讲解基因检测与女性携带者知识
subtitle.en: Expert Explanation on Genetic Testing and Female Carrier Knowledge

description.zh: 南昌市血之友公益协会主办、左钰洁主持了《携带者检测费用援助项目》线上宣讲，邀请上海瑞金医院检验科副主任戴菁老师、南昌市第一医院检验科古艳老师，向累计120多位听众讲解血友病基因检测、女性携带者和患者相关知识。
description.en: Nanchang Hemophilia Association hosted an online lecture on the 'Carrier Testing Cost Assistance Project', moderated by Yujie (Ruby) Zuo. The lecture invited Dr. Dai Jing, Deputy Director of Clinical Laboratory at Shanghai Ruijin Hospital, and Dr. Gu Yan from Clinical Laboratory of Nanchang First Hospital, to explain hemophilia genetic testing and knowledge about female carriers and patients to more than 120 attendees.

title.zh: 携带者检测费用援助项目线上宣讲视频
title.en: Carrier Testing Cost Assistance Project Online Lecture Video
